The user spits out a large volume of foam-like bubbles which covers the ground and reduces its friction, considerably limiting the opponents' movements. The bubbles are spit out with violent force that is capable of washing away most attacks, such as [[Toad Oil Bullet|oil]] and [[Fire Release|fire]]. This technique can also be used as an effective smokescreen.
